moreBlocks.articles:
• Firm Overview
    Our experienced litigation attorneys and dedicated staff have one focus: relentlessly pursue justice on your behalf.
  • Our Attorneys
    The attorneys at Bye, Goff & Rohde have over 180 years of combined experience with personal injury cases in western Wisconsin and Minnesota.
  • Practice Areas
    We only work with personal injury cases and have decades of trial experience. You can be sure you're getting the best attorneys working for you with Bye, Goff & Rohde.
  • Success Stories
    Bye, Goff & Rohde is built on a tradition of hard work and success. No matter the size of your claim, we treat your case with the attention, dignity and persistence you deserve.
  • Frequently Asked Questions
    Dealing with medical bills, insurance companies and the legal process can be confusing. We want to make sure you understand what's happening with your personal injury lawsuit and get all of your questions answered.

description:
Bye, Goff & Rohde, Ltd., is a personal injury law firm in River Falls, Wisconsin. For more than 40 years, our law firm has represented injured victims throughout the surrounding areas, including Eau Claire, Menomonie, Hudson, La Crosse, Duluth/Superior, western Wisconsin and eastern Minnesota.

We Put The "Personal" Back Into Personal Injury

At our law firm, we focus exclusively on personal injury and wrongful death accidents. We concentrate our efforts on this one area of law to provide superior service and personal attention to every client we work with. We handle cases with drive and determination to obtain the best results possible for every client.

Our personal injury attorneys have more than 180 years of combined practice experience. We handle a broad range of cases involving motor vehicle accidents, property liability, bodily harm and dangerous products. Our entire team of lawyers and staff are dedicated to pursuing justice for every client. We put our clients first and provide them with exceptional courtroom and settlement advocacy. Bye, Goff & Rohde, Ltd., is a law firm that understands our clients' concerns and the challenges they face with an unexpected injury or death. We work hard to help clients manage health care expenses, wage loss and other issues. When we go up against unfair insurance companies, they know our reputation for success and our relentless approach to getting just results.

The lawyers here are experienced in all aspects of personal injury law. We are recognized by our peers as leaders in our field and have been listed in Wisconsin's Super Lawyers. In addition, we are members of the American Association for Justice, the Million Dollar Advocates Forum and the Minnesota Association for Justice.

We offer free consultations to discuss your situation in person. For scheduling, contact our law firm at 800-607-3030. Evening and weekend appointments are available. We make hospital visits and will travel at no cost to surrounding areas.
